abstract: Neighborhood Joint column; Sarah Chanie Benarroch-Brafman operates Space yoga studio and Gymies Gym out of brownstone in Brooklyn's Crown Heights neighborhood; endeavors cater to women and children of Chabad-Lubavitch Hasidic community.
lead_paragraph: Gymies Gym and the Space, in a Crown Heights brownstone, provide places for ultra-Orthodox Jewish children and women to be active while respecting the laws of their religion.

headline.main: Gym and Yoga Studio in Brooklyn Cater to Hasidim

snippet: Gymies Gym and the Space, in a Crown Heights brownstone, provide places for ultra-Orthodox Jewish children and women to be active while respecting the laws of their religion.
